·  All Growth Rates in the report are Year-on-Year Growth Rate.
·  The market defined in CHPA report is the hospital market with beds > 100, which is about 64% of total China RX market.

•L1A = Alkylating Agents
•L1B = Antimetabolites
•L1C = Vinca Alkaloids
•L1D = Antineoplastic Antibiotics
•L1X2 = Platinum Compounds

•Lilly relevant TKI Mkt: ICOTINIB, Gefitinib, Erlotinib, Crizotinib, Bevacizumab, Afatinib, Osimertinib
